name: Brown Sugar Instant Oatmeal Muffins
author: ADTC
summary: I was looking for a recipe with both brown sugar and oatmeal and came up with this!! Enjoy!
ingredients: 2 packets instant maple and brown sugar oatmeal
directions: Preheat  oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Combine 3 tablespoons flour, brown sugar, and cinnamon in a small bowl
Use a pastry blender or two knives to cut in the butter until the mixture resembles coarse crumbs
Combine 1 3/4 cup flour, white sugar, baking powder, salt, and the instant oatmeal in a large bowl
Make a well in the center of the flour mixture; pour in the egg, milk, and oil
Spoon batter into prepared muffin cups, filling each 2/3 full
Evenly sprinkle streusel topping over muffins
Bake in preheated oven until toothpick inserted in center of muffin comes out clean, about 15 minutes
Cool on wire rack for 5 minutes before serving
